TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You die before you get it.

I wish Trekkette would spontaneously combust.

No "You die before you get it" Please. I am gonna do Trekkets again.

Granted, but it becomes a strong AI, and destroys earth.

I wish for a Hitchhikers guide to the galaxy

Edited June 4, 2013 by sparty48
Granted. The book tells you nothing about being able to hitchhike.

Granted, but nothing happens due to your wish being invisible/nonexistent.

I wish that everything was fireproof.

granted but now fire is waterproof

I wish I wasnt writing this in school

Granted. You've now written that on asteroid 2003 UB313, minutes before you succumb to space vaccum since you don't have any suit at all. Wait, how did you got there in the first place?

I wish for food.

Granted. You get a bread crumb. and you'll get no more because we're moving you to north korea.

I wish that we would just take north Korea out so we wouldn't have to deal with them.

Granted, but YOU'RE COMING WITH THEM.

I wish for a box of awesome.

granted but its from a prank store and actually has fail

i wish i could think of a wish

P.S. i think i just sniped u on TWO threads

Edited June 4, 2013 by crasher925

Granted, but you never actually wish your new wish.

I wish that I could wish whenever I wished that I could wish whenever I wished that I could wish whenever I wished that I could wish whenever I wished that I could wish...

Granted, but you have just made a genie his head asplode when you've wished that. Now you'll pay.

I wish for infinite flight.

granted but now you can't land.

I wish for antimatter

Granted. It spawned in your house and, oh wait... your house is a smoldering crater now...

I wish for orbital strikes.

Granted, you are the first target.

I wish for Jeb to exist.

Granted, but the explosion caused in his creation makes everything else not exist.

I wish for a cream soda and a pumpkin pie.

granted but the soad is flat and the pie crowling with maggots

i wish for a Rocket

Granted. It explodes at sunrise.

I wish for a rainbow!

granted but its a double rainbow and the double rainbow guy appears next to u and annoys you with his love for double rainbows.

i wish i was a kerbin

Granted, but I included a bonus! You're now colorblind!

I wish for a cake.

Granted. CAKE

I wish for jokes like that ^^^

Granted. They're all on you

I wish to kill a thread.

Granted. It's the PfL thread.

I wish i didn't just suggest that.

Granted. You never existed to suggest that, either.

I wish for a llama

Granted, it does nothing but spit at you.

I wish for a thousand cute kittens!

Granted. They're called Rage098-Rage1098

I wish for robots
